sections.title: Cookie usage
sections.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. Cookies enable us to understand how our site is being used so that we can understand what works and what doesn't, and to provide a better experience.

sections.title: Strictly necessary cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of this website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly

sections.title: Analytics cookies
sections.description: These cookies are used for analytics purposes. They help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This website uses Microsoft Clarity to analyze user behavior.

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us.
